short_description: PCG has been a great partner to The Alaska Club, allowing us to expand our clubs to provide more services to our members and add new formats in our trampoline park and yoga studio formats.
author: Robert Brewster
subheading: Full-service, family friendly health clubs and trampoline parks in Alaska
description: The Alaska Club is a full-service family friendly health and fitness center with gym facilities and much more, including personal training, child care, swim lessons, tennis, racquetball, basketball, high-tech exercise machines, and fitness classes like yoga, cycling, step, pilates, strength training, with more added all the time! In addition, TAC offers a unique yoga experience at “The Studio” and Fly Trampoline Parks in Anchorage and Fairbanks, AK.
alt: PCG Investment in The Alaska Club

short_description: PCG's early investment has helped SEB accelerate our U.S. and global expansion, capitalizing on the company's robust growth rate and global consumer interest in fitness / health clubs.
author: Chuck Runyon
subheading: Anytime Fitness, The Barre Method, Base Camp and Waxing the City
description: Anytime Fitness is the fastest-growing and largest fitness franchise in the world with more than 3 million members in more than 4,000 gyms on every continent. Recently honored as the world's 'Top Global Franchise' by Entrepreneur magazine, Anytime Fitness offers entrepreneurs a convenient and affordable recurring-revenue business model. The Barre Method is a leader in barre fitness with over 100 franchise operations throughout the United States. Base Camp is a boutique fitness operator with 10 locations in the US, expanding internationally, focused on quick (45 minute) cardio/weight balanced workouts.
alt: PCG Investment in Self Esteem Brands

short_description: PCG has been a great partner to Califia Farms and our predecessor companies for many years. We consider PCG good friends in addition to being business partners. Most importantly PCG shares Califia Farms values.
author: Greg Steltenpohl
description: Inspired by the bounty of California, Califia Farms is on a mission is to inspire and nourish the world with the wisdom of a plant-based lifestyle. The company was named the 2017 Supplier of the Year by Whole Foods Market, a 2015 'Breakout Brand' by Beverage World, BevNet's 2015 'Brand of the Year' and is a leader in the revolution to de-commodify the food and beverage industry by creating innovative, healthy and great-tasting premium beverages that make it easy for consumers to go plant-based and dairy-free, without compromise. Califia Farms is one of the fastest-growing natural beverage companies in the U.S., as well as the leading brand in the natural products nut milk and coffee drinks category. Founded in 2010 by a farmer's co-operative based in the San Joaquin Valley and headed by beverage visionary Greg Steltenpohl, Califia Farms is a uniquely California company. Its Bakersfield, Calif. manufacturing plant uses artisanally-inspired processes to create healthy and delicious plant-based beverages, is eco-friendly, energy efficient and repurposes more than 90 percent of its post-production byproduct.

short_description: In the consumer health / wellness space there is no firm with better historic perspective, strategic insights and personal relationships than PCG.
author: Paul Pruett
subheading: The best protein products in the market since 1993
description: Designer Wellness is a leader in high-quality protein products that support healthy nutrition, fitness and overall well-being. Our range includes whey and plant-based proteins, as well as superfoods, designed for health, strength and performance. We believe that fitness is a holistic frame of mind, a lifestyle. Through proper nutrition and exercise, we can all achieve our fitness goals.  This philosophy was the impetus behind the launch of Designer Whey 100% Whey Protein Powder in 1993 and resulted in the emergence of the whey protein powder category.

short_description: PCG was responsible for bringing the capital and focus to our business that allowed HLN to grow throughout the west coast. PCG not only brings capital but a true spirit of partnership.
author: Jason Bliss
description: The Healthy Living Network consists of independently owned and operated home health agencies that provide in-home medical, rehabilitative and support services by experienced professionals with extensive clinical, healthcare, and hospitality backgrounds. These agencies are committed to an At Your Service philosophy of care for patients, family members, referral sources, as well as, for their employees.
alt: PCG Investment in Healthy Living Network

description: Headquartered in Newport Beach, California, FitLab is the first platform to connect every aspect of your fitness lifestyle, bringing immersive experiences to life whenever, wherever, and however you train. FitLab provides a community driven approach to fitness through their hybrid fitness experiences and related commerce offerings in partnership with iconic athletes & brands for next-generation consumers. Notable partnerships include McGregor FAST, Nike Studios, and Assault Fitness

short_description: PCG's early investment has helped SEB accelerate our U.S. and global expansion, capitalizing on the company's robust growth rate and global consumer interest in fitness / health clubs.
description: Wellness Brands Fueled Through FranchisingSelf Esteem Brands focuses on making health, wellness, and self-care more accessible through their global franchises. Self Esteem Brands builds world-class businesses on the simple idea that everyone should have access to the tools they need to look, feel and live their best. Self Esteem Brands collectively has over 5,000 locations across the world, 4,000,000+ members, and are active in 39 countries and all 7 continents – even Antarctica!
alt: PCG Investment in Self Esteem Brands

short_description: PCG's early investment has helped SEB accelerate our U.S. and global expansion, capitalizing on the company's robust growth rate and global consumer interest in fitness / health clubs.
description: Basecamp Fitness is a fast-growing fitness franchise under Self Esteem Brands that focuses on High Intensity Interval Training (HIIT) classes. With 25+ studio locations across the United States, Basecamp Fitness offers a new and innovative approach to fitness that is not only intense but also fun through their variety of 35-minute HIIT workouts.
alt: PCG Investment in Self Basecamp Fitness

short_description: PCG's early investment has helped SEB accelerate our U.S. and global expansion, capitalizing on the company's robust growth rate and global consumer interest in fitness / health clubs.
subheading: Wellness Program Provider for Organizations and their People
description: Healthy Contributions is a wellness program creator and manager for small-to-mid-sized businesses, health insurance providers, benefit networks, employers, and more. With over 16,000 fitness network partners, 11,000,000 workouts rewarded per year, and $1,300,000 secure fund reimbursements, Healthy Contributions provides highly effective wellness solutions with their knowledgeable and specialized professionals who create effective programs to help organizations and their people achieve health goals.

short_description: PCG's early investment has helped SEB accelerate our U.S. and global expansion, capitalizing on the company's robust growth rate and global consumer interest in fitness / health clubs.
description: Stronger U Nutrition is a personalized nutrition program that caters to each individual's personal needs through their emphasis of coaching, education, community, and connection. Led by experienced professionals in the health & dietetics industry, the Stronger U methodology utilizes science and research to develop nutrition plans for their members and pairs each member with a one-on-one coach who brings a professional or educational background in dietitian.
alt: PCG Investment in Stronger U Nutrition

short_description: PCG's early investment has helped SEB accelerate our U.S. and global expansion, capitalizing on the company's robust growth rate and global consumer interest in fitness / health clubs.
description: The Bar Studio is a fitness company that specializes in Barre, a full-body workout that uses body weight and small movements derived from ballet. With over 20+ years of experience and nearly 100 locations across the US and Canada, The Bar Method has an established history of success and growth through their Barre classes that transform the body through high-repetition, low impact resistance training.
alt: PCG Investment in The Bar Method

short_description: PCG's early investment has helped SEB accelerate our U.S. and global expansion, capitalizing on the company's robust growth rate and global consumer interest in fitness / health clubs.
description: With over 100 locations across the US, Waxing the City is a nationwide waxing studio that prides itself on its waxing service that doesn’t just remove hair but truly boosts self-esteem. Utilizing their team of highly trained Cerologists, Waxing the City provides the ultimate waxing service with their custom-formulated wax that offers gentle hair removal while soothing, exfoliating, and softening skin.
alt: PCG Investment in Waxing the City

short_description: PCG allowed Cytosport to grow from a powder business to ready to drink, bars and more, more than tripling the size of our business before our sale to Hormel and later to Pepsi Co. We appreciate their focus and partnership.
author: Mike Pickett
description: As the makers of MUSCLE MILK, MONSTER MILK and CYTOMAX brands, CytoSport is dedicated to providing premium protein products that elevate everyday performance for every body. Cytosport’s portfolio serves the needs of elite athletes, active lifestylists and weekend warriors with a wide-range of innovative protein-enhanced solutions that taste great and appeal to evolving consumer demands. Cytosport is a trusted partner with storied collegiate athletic programs, world-class professional athletes, and elite training facilities. All CytoSport, Inc. powder products are NSF Certified for Sport ensuring their safety and freedom of banned substances.

short_description: TBL and PCG under the leadership of Brent Knudsen have truly been a partner to develop real value for our company.
author: Ric Scalzo
subheading: The leading herbal brand in North America.
description: Gaia Herbs cultivates health and wellbeing by stewarding sustainable relationships between plants and people. Our unparalleled dedication to purity, integrity and potency is meticulously proven by science. We use organic methods from seed to shelf and offer the industry's only traceability program, MeetYourHerbs.

short_description: TBL/PCG understood our values based vision and provided a means for us grow and eventually find the right acquisition partner.
author: Steve Fafel
subheading: Helping nonprofits accomplish their missions with gifting software
description: GiftWorks makes software and solutions for nonprofit organizations all across the United States and around the world.  GiftWorks products are easy to use and affordable.  GiftWorks helps nonprofits accomplish their mission.

short_description: The PCG team provided us the opportunity to expand throughout the Northeastern corridor and eventually sell to Planet Organic creating a strong US / CN natural grocer.
author: Harold Hochberger
description: Mrs. Greens Natural Market is a consumer services company based out of 12 Triangle Shopping Ctr, Yorktown Heights, New York, United States.

short_description: PCG has provided Numi with good insights into the marketplace, opportunities for strategic partnerships and overall industry awareness, both for organizational and board growth.
author: Ahmed Rahim
subheading: Award-winning, leading producer of organic tea
description: Founded in 1999 by brother and sister Ahmed Rahim and Reem Hassani, Numi Organic Tea is an award-winning social enterprise, founding B Corporation member, and leading purchaser of organic, Fair Trade teas distributed in more than 50 countries. Still family-owned and headquartered in Oakland, California, Numi supports community development projects both locally and internationally that create lasting positive impacts for people and the Earth. To date, Numi has contributed more than $1 million in Fair Trade Premiums in its tea farming communities. Numi's Fair Trade and Fair Labor commitments have helped sponsor schools, hospitals, community centers, road construction and other improvements for living standards. Through plant-based and sustainable packaging, carbon offsets, and regenerative organic agriculture, Numi strives to create lasting positive impact for the planet and each other.

short_description: PCG took the reins in combining our business into a US – CN stronghold in natural and organic grocery, with a strong partnership focus and high values.
author: Darren Krissie
subheading: Specialist food retailer in the organic and natural food sector
description: Planet Organic Ltd is a specialist food retailer, operating in the organic and natural food sector and offers consumers the opportunity of a specialist one stop shop in a mini supermarket format and online. The company is seen as the expert in its market both by customers local to its stores and by national suppliers and media. Planet Organic operates at the forefront of the trend towards healthier eating. Planet Organic sells a full range of organic foods and additionally sells 'natural foods' which are conventionally produced but are less refined and are not processed using artificial flavourings and preservatives. In total, Planet Organic sells 8,000 product lines both which fall into three broad categories: Organic and Healthy Foods, 'Food to Go' (hot and cold food which is freshly prepared on the premises) and Health & Bodycare.

short_description: We appreciate PCG's counsel and support. Their broad industry knowledge gives them a unique perspective that provides significant operating value.
author: Simon Goode
subheading: Healthy Protein and Energy Bars that are Gluten Free and Vegetarian
description: Looking for a snack that not only tastes great, but is high in protein, vegetarian friendly and certified gluten-free? If so, Promax has your solution. Promax energy bars are designed with the active, busy person in mind. They provide solid nutrition wherever you go and are ready whenever you need them. Complete with 18 vitamins and minerals, these bars are so flavorful, it'll be one protein-rich snack you look forward to day after day. At Promax, we recognize you work hard towards improving your health and make sure our products will provide lasting energy to fuel your workouts or your busy day. They're delicious, nutritious, and satisfying – and will show you how enjoyable healthy eating can be!

short_description: PCG's industry knowledge and team has added value to our business each and every year.
author: Ryan Black
description: Founded in 2000, SAMBAZON (an acronym for: Sustainable Management of the Brazilian Amazon) is the first and only certified Organic and Fair Trade Açaí company, the Amazon Superfoods industry leader. SAMBAZON supplies ethically-sourced Açaí products from a closed loop supply chain to ensure its products had complete traceability and transparency, from the palm of a tree to the palm of consumers' hands. SAMBAZON product options includes Açaí bowls and smoothies for food service accounts and provides fresh juices, smoothies, energy drinks and frozen superfruit products made from delicious blends of Brazilian fruits and botanicals like Açaí, acerola, yerba mate and guaraná. Sambazon products can be found across 23,000 grocery stores and more than 10,000 food service accounts in the US and across 38 countries.

short_description: PCG has been a tremendous partner over the years; their insight and leadership has been very valuable.
author: Chris Dunn
subheading: Surfboarding manufacturing from the heart of Santa Cruz
description: From its humble beginnings over 25 years ago in the sleepy coastal town of Santa Cruz to becoming a globally recognized brand, Surftech is a part of a global community of surfers, shapers, designers, and craftsman who are connected through surfing and the pursuit of perfection. Surftech takes pride in every board they make and celebrates the millions of waves around the world that have been ridden on their boards.

short_description: PCG was responsible for acquisitions and organic growth that developed GYMVMT from a small Calgary based fitness club to a leader in Western Canada with multiple formats.
author: Rob Leach
subheading: Leader in fitness clubs throughout Western Canada
description: With 19 locations across Alberta (6 coed and 4 women's only facilities in Calgary, and 5 coed and 4 women's only facilities in Edmonton), GYMVMT and HER GYMVMT offer executive, sports and fitness gym memberships. Presenting a fresh take on offering both big box fitness space and amenities alongside boutique studio expertise and programming, be sure to check out our cross-fit inspired programming through our PWR X LAB studio and our immersive cycle experience in our Trū Ride studios. Offering great amenities and top of the line equipment, featuring tennis and squash courts, outdoor pool, rogue rigs, turf, Olympic lifting platforms, top of the line equipment, child minding services and so much more. Get to know our pros through our Personal Training programs or Group Fitness and Cycle classes, available in club or virtually to catch up on your fitness goals.

short_description: We appreciate PCG’s partnership in supporting Rudy’s growth in retail and products throughout the Northwestern US. They are great partners.
author: Katie Trent
description: Founded in 1993 at the epicenter of Seattle's cultural explosion. Rudy's was built on the idea that a barbershop should be a gathering place with purpose, for people from all walks of life. Rudy's is made up of individuals who are committed to craft, with a shared passion for quality, customer, and community. Rudy's is an ever-growing company with career opportunities at our shops across the country and at our headquarters in Seattle. We serve a diverse range of customers, all ages and types, and we know there is no one size fits all solution for their needs. To that end, we encourage diversity in our workforce and look for all kinds of talented and genuine people to join our team.

short_description: The process prior to bringing PCG on board was daunting and intimidating which changed 180 degrees after they took the helm, managed the process and secured multiple excellent partners to choose from.
author: Michael Landau
description: DryBar has 125+ locations nationwide and a line of styling products and tools crafted for the perfect blowout at home‎. Drybar oversees the 140+ blowout salon locations across the USA. Drybar Products was recently acquired by Helen of Troy brands.

short_description: Discover our delicious snacks made from organic ingredients. Try Pure Organic layered fruit bars and snack crackers today!
description: Pure Organic makes layered fruit bars from organic fruit purees and juices, and organic cheese crackers baked with 100% real cheese. Pure was started by Veronica Lehman back in 2006 when she wanted to feed her children the most nutritious food. I don’t have a quote from the CEO (Veronica Lehman) so you can leave that section blank.

short_description: PCG delivers on what they promise and are true partner in the business. They provide much more than just capital.
author: Tanner Bell
subheading: The largest overnight running relay series in the US
description: Based in Salt Lake City Utah, Ragnar Relay Series is the largest overnight running relay series in the United States. Ragnar is always on the lookout for phenomenally talented rock stars to join our team.
